pullRequest.title: feature(new-ui): Add new Remote Search Selector
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist


 the contributor license agreement is signed
 commit message follows commit guidelines
 tests are included
 screenshots are included showing significant UI changes

Description of change

This adds a new 'selector' for the New Search UI to navigate to the remote legacy remote search pages. The New UI side of things all works, however it has unveiled a few bugs with the legacy UI remote searching (primarily excessive persisting of state). Those issues are well outside the scope of this work, however will definitely need to be fixed to release 2020.2 and so will be in a PR soon.
Video: https://streamable.com/on6ljx


#1306

commit.message: feature(new-ui): Add new Remote Search Selector

nodes.bodyText: I am not quite sure about the use of memoize. As the first argument passed to the memoized function is the cache key by default, what is the cache key for below async call which does not take any argument ? Will we always get the cached result despite having different remote searches ?

nodes.bodyText: May I ask why this effect depends on setRemoteSearches ? I think setRemoteSearches will not reference to a new function that updates the state as long as the component is alive in one lifecycle. Is depending on remoteSearchesSupplier  enough ?

commit.message:
chore(new-ui): Remove unnecessary useEffect dependency

Part of feedback from #2539
